message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm aiming to sell it for $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm confident this product is worth a premium. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position, but I still believe the product is worth no more than $10,000 to me. Could we possibly meet at $11,000?
